# HMCharacteristicValuePositionState.closing

**Case**

The position is moving towards minimum value.

## Declaration

```swift
case closing
```

## Position States

- **HMCharacteristicValuePositionState.opening**: The position is moving towards maximum value.
- **HMCharacteristicValuePositionState.stopped**: The accessory isn’t moving.

items.description: The position is moving towards maximum value.
